name: VoipYO | Cheapest Voip Calls
description: VoipYo allows you to call your friends and family wherever they are in the world at the lowest rates possible. Save up to 98% on your international phone bill!  No matter the destination youre trying to call: VoipYO can guarantee you the very lowest rate available! All you have to do is download our application, register with VoipYO and buy credit. You can easily save up to 90% on your monthly calling charges. No more nasty surprises when the phone bill has to be paid: You can now spend more money on all those things youd rather do than pay the bills!  Feel free to compare VoipYOs rates with more expensive alternatives like Rebtel, Vonage and Skype, and convince yourself: we ARE the cheapest option! And dont forget: not only can you save huge amounts of money on your international calls, you can also save nice sums of money every month by using VoipYO for your national calls. The next time you pick up your mobile phone for a call to the neighbor or your family in another city, use VoipYO as well!  All you need is your Smartphone, a working 3G, 4G or Wifi internet signal, and you can make cheap telephone calls anywhere you are! This is one of the easiest ways to save money, with cheap call rates from VoipYO you will never spend too much money on your social calls again!  Using our app as a default dialer may interfere with dialing 911 emergency services.
